citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 P.M. on
08/20/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, honking the horn, and calling the
phone number listed on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 P.M. on 
08/20/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door, honking the horn, and calling the 
phone number listed on the account. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a 
serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
